thread.title: Graduate Students Push for Unions at More Private Colleges
thread.title_full: Graduate Students Push for Unions at More Private Colleges - WSJ

author: Melissa Korn
title: Graduate Students Push for Unions at More Private Colleges
text:
The pace of efforts to unionize graduate-student workers at private colleges nationwide continue to increase, with a vote in favor of unionization earlier this month at Loyola University Chicago and at least a partial victory at Yale University on Thursday. 

Duke University graduate studentsâ€™ votes are expected to be tallied today, and graduate students at Pennsylvania State University filed this week to hold elections. Their...
